summary: Adds fully animated Bound Daedric Armors
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][IMG]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/28692-1-1359698335.jpg[/IMG][/CENTER]

[center][url=http://www.skyrimgems.com][img]http://i.imgur.com/1wXSO.png[/img][/url][/center]
 
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]Ever feel like the conjuration school was missing [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]something......but you\'re a lore purist and refused to [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]try my True Bound Armors Mod, becasue the meshes [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]weren\'t Daedric? This mod aims to fix that With this [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]mod, you can summon Bound Daedric Armors, keeping with [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]Skyrim\'s bound weapons\' theme, and remaining true to [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]Elder Scrolls Lore.[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]There have been a couple of mods that allowed you to [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]equip armor via spell, but this mod is more than that. [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]The Armors you conjuire wil lhave many unique [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]properites.[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]*Armors will have animated flames similar to bound [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]weapons[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER]
[COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]*Armors will be transparent similar to bound weapons[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER]
[COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]*Armors feature custom meshes, making them unique sets[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER]
[COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]*The conjuration spell will feature casting effects, [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]meaning you won\'t just \"hotkey\" equip the armor, it\'s [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]apperance will be masked by the spell\'s special [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]effects.[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER]
[COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]*Best of all the armor will not un-equip your current [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]items[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]The mod will stack the armor meshes over your current [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]items. This means you will basiclly be wearing two sets [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]of armor, and some clipping will occur. Armor can be [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]worn with any clothes/armor modded or default. Each set [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]was desinged with specific default armor in mind, [/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]wearing this will greatly reduce clipping.[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER]
[COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]Mage Armor=Mage robes[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER]
[COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]Heavy Armor=Ebony armor[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]
[CENTER]
[COLOR=#eeece1][SIZE=3][FONT=Palatino Linotype][B][I]Daedric=Steel plate armor[/I][/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/CENTER]

 
[CENTER][youtube]3Dz5QbDi5xc[/youtube][/CENTER]


[CENTER]Other Mods by me: Check them out they\'re all hidden gems lol[/CENTER]

author: foster
